title: Témacsoport funkció kikapcsolása
content:
Jó napot kívánok!

A Thunderbird 115.4.2. veziót használom. A legutolsó frissítés után aktiválódott a témacsoport funkció. Sajnos a levelező partnereim - ez lehet csak nálam jelentkezik - a "tárgy" mező kitöltését teljesen kaotikusan és össze vissza kezelik. Ezt azt jelenti hogy nem feltétlenül abban a témában írnak levelet ami a téma, hanem elővesznek egy korábbi levelet amit nekem írtak és valami teljesen más témáú levelet írnak mint ami az ereseti téma. Ez szerintem a levelezési kulra hiánya, de nem tudok vele mit kezdeni...

A kérdésem az lenne, hogy hogyan tudom a "témacsoport" funkciót kikapcsolni? Tehát nem összecsukni akarom hanem a levelek érkezzeek meg szépen sorban, ne legyenek semmi módon a korábbi levelek alá rendezve.

A mellékletben lévő képen az látszik hogy a "Előzetes Műszaki felmérés / Részleges gyártásindítás" mintha egy beszélgetés lenne, de nem. Ezene a "tárgyon" valójában 4-5 külön projektről van szó és innen kezdbe mivel nincs rendesen kezelve a tárgy mező teljes a káosz. Ha ezek a levelek - mint korábban - szépen egymás után jelennek meg akkor tudom kezelni.

Köszönöm!
creator: rado.attila

No messages advising any problem. Just sits there doing nothing. I have 900 emails backedup at the provider waiting to be downloaded.

title: Problemi spooler di stampa
content: Buongiorno, stiamo riscontrando con diversi client problemi di stampa, ossia in fase di stampa da thunderbird lo spooler di stampa si blocca impedendo la visualizzazione delle stampanti nonchè la stampa stessa. L'unica opzione che rimane è quella di salvare la mail in formato pdf. E' previsto un aggiornamento del programma per la risoluzione di questo bug? Il problema si presenta solo dopo l'aggiornamento all'ultima versione. Grazie S. Minervino

title: Calendar not working correctly - time allocation problem
content:
Hi, I will describe my procces of saving events in my calendat. This problem occured with a last software update. I use Thunderbird 115.4.2 (64 bits) on macOS 14.1 and the problem happens only with this calendar hosted: https://email.active24.com/webdav/XXX@YYY.ZZZ/Calendar/. I dont have this problem with GMAIL calendars.

I create and save an event in my calendar (XXX@YYY.ZZZ) e.g. 5pm on 14th of December 2023, everything looks good. After quitting the app and reopening it the same event shifts towards earlier time 8amp on the same day. Even when I shift it back, next time it's shifted to earlier time. And the other thing is that when I want to manually shift an event with my mouse to change time, the event automaticly changes it's time to 12am of the same day. I can even change start or end of an event with my mouse, becasue everytime I try to do it, the event automaticly changes its origin to 12am. So, no event can be moved and it becomes a headake when I realise I've just donated money :D

It does happen only when I create any event in Thunderbird on my Mac.

It doesn't happen when I'm invited to an event, when I create any event in the native Calendar app on macOS or iOS.

---–>See in the pictures.

Thank you for any help.
creator: chuckels2

title: Dark mode: Text not visible when replying to some HTML emails
content:
I use dark mode (Windows 10 Pro, Thunderbird 115.4.2 (64-bit)). Fresh installation, fresh profile. When I reply to some emails, the reply text is not visible. The examples I saw were with a light (white?) background, but I'm not sure if it also happens with other backgrounds. But it's not all white backgrounds either, some emails with a light background I can reply to just fine.

The reply area can be dark with a dark grey font (slightly different color), or it can be white with a white font. In both cases, obviously the text I type is not readable.

Any idea how to fix this?

title: Too many emails marked junk
content: Suddenly, over the past few weeks, a surprisingly large number of my incoming emails are marked as suspected junk. This is not helpful, only adds a step I have to take before reading emails. Overzealous new employee(s) perhaps? New way to make me feel like I'm cared about (not working)?
creator: jlsim

title: How do I get Thunderbird 115 to give me just ONE notification tone only and an icon in the tray as it receives NEW email only?
content:
How do I get Thunderbird 115 to give me just ONE notification tone only and an icon in the tray as it receives a NEW email only? Currently, I cannot find the correct settings in the Settings, General tab that will accomplish this behavior. I do not like notification windows at all. Never did, never will. I do not want Thunderbird to continually nag me about messages that I have not had the time to look at. And I do not want Thunderbird 115 to alert me in any way about emails that are marked as unread but I have already glanced at the contents and will get to them later.

One tone, one time, only if it is a bonafide NEW email. I do not care about the ones I've already scanned for content, but have not thoroughly read them so I mark them as unread.

Thank you for your time in reading this post!

bob3d

PS The new email alert behavior as described above is just like the way Outlook 2019 does it. I am trying to ditch Outlook in favor of Thunderbird and the problem as stated above is holding me back from making the switch.
creator: bob368

title: Mozilla Thunderbird Stopped Loading E-mails or Sending E-mails on 10-25-2023
content:
Mozilla Thunderbird suddenly stopped loading e-mails from my ISP WOW! on my laptop on 10-25-2023. Any support or advice?

It began giving me the following error messages when trying to get or send messages: Sending of password for user sdcrumley did not succeed. Mail server pop3.knology.net responded: Auth-Status: Invalid login or password. Login to server pop3.knology.net with username sdcrumley failed.

However, I can still get messages and send messages on Wowway.com website/server. They have me in with same username/e-mail address and password. No problems there. Also checked the incoming and outgoing messages settings for correct addresses and they have not changed.
creator: sdcrumley
